name: Baby Time Simulator
description:
Escape the busy daily grind and become a baby again!


The ultimate game for recapturing the pure joy of babyhood that we've all forgotten. By simply shaking a rattle, you can unlock the infinite possibilities that lie dormant within you.

Simplicity that anyone can enjoy:
This game is something that people of all ages can quickly enjoy. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, you can experience the joy of freely shaking a rattle.

Unexpected surprises and moments of smiles:
Experience the unpredictable humor that lurks in each and every moment of daily life. Sentences are randomly generated based on the combination of "when," "who," and "what," making you break into a smile unexpectedly.

Learn again, grow again:
By shaking the rattle, rediscover the fresh surprises and curiosity you felt as a baby. By exploring new movements and rhythms, the inner baby within you will grow once more.

A beautiful world from a baby's perspective:
Beautiful landscapes and graceful music will help you rediscover the world from a baby's perspective. By looking at the world from a new viewpoint, a peaceful feeling and a tranquil atmosphere are born.
